author: Staff Reporter
text:
Unidentified persons set on fire Vilavancode Assembly constituency office of the Naam Tamilar Katchi in Narianvilai near Kuzhithurai on Saturday night.

According to police, some persons entered the party office after breaking open the main door, ransacked the office and set party flags, banners and furniture on fire by pouring petrol on them.

The Kalyakavilai police have registered a case and are investigating.
title: NTK office set on fire near Kuzhithurai
